ArticleTitle.sentence: In vitro interactions of integration host factor with the ompF promoter-regulatory region of Escherichia coli.

event.clue: In vitro interactions of integration host factor with the ompF promoter-regulatory region of Escherichia coli.

AbstractText.sentence: Previous work has shown that integration host factor (IHF) mutants have increased expression and altered osmoregulation of OmpF, a major Escherichia coli outer membrane protein.

event.clue: Previous work has shown that integration host factor (IHF) mutants have increased expression and altered osmoregulation of OmpF, a major Escherichia coli outer membrane protein.
Previous work has shown that integration host factor (IHF) mutants have increased expression and altered osmoregulation of OmpF, a major Escherichia coli outer membrane protein.
Previous work has shown that integration host factor (IHF) mutants have increased expression and altered osmoregulation of OmpF, a major Escherichia coli outer membrane protein.

AbstractText.sentence: By in vitro analysis the possibility was investigated that IHF interacts directly with the ompF promoter region.

event.clue: By in vitro analysis the possibility was investigated that IHF interacts directly with the ompF promoter region.

AbstractText.sentence: Gel retardation assays and DNase I protection experiments showed that IHF binds to two sites in the ompF promoter region centered at positions -180 and -60 relative to the start of transcription.

event.clue: Gel retardation assays and DNase I protection experiments showed that IHF binds to two sites in the ompF promoter region centered at positions -180 and -60 relative to the start of transcription.

AbstractText.sentence: Gel electrophoresis studies with circularly permuted ompF promoter fragments indicated that IHF binding strongly increased a small intrinsic bend in the ompF promoter region.

event.clue: Gel electrophoresis studies with circularly permuted ompF promoter fragments indicated that IHF binding strongly increased a small intrinsic bend in the ompF promoter region.

AbstractText.sentence: The addition of IHF to a purified in vitro transcription system strongly and specifically inhibited ompF transcription.

event.clue: The addition of IHF to a purified in vitro transcription system strongly and specifically inhibited ompF transcription.
The addition of IHF to a purified in vitro transcription system strongly and specifically inhibited ompF transcription.
The addition of IHF to a purified in vitro transcription system strongly and specifically inhibited ompF transcription.

AbstractText.sentence: This inhibition was reversed by increasing the concentration of OmpR, a positive activator required for ompF expression, suggesting that IHF may inhibit ompF transcription by altering how OmpR interacts with the ompF promoter.

event.clue: This inhibition was reversed by increasing the concentration of OmpR, a positive activator required for ompF expression, suggesting that IHF may inhibit ompF transcription by altering how OmpR interacts with the ompF promoter.

This inhibition was reversed by increasing the concentration of OmpR, a positive activator required for ompF expression, suggesting that IHF may inhibit ompF transcription by altering how OmpR interacts with the ompF promoter.

This inhibition was reversed by increasing the concentration of OmpR, a positive activator required for ompF expression, suggesting that IHF may inhibit ompF transcription by altering how OmpR interacts with the ompF promoter.

This inhibition was reversed by increasing the concentration of OmpR, a positive activator required for ompF expression, suggesting that IHF may inhibit ompF transcription by altering how OmpR interacts with the ompF promoter.
